changeDepartureDate: Change the departure date with the input below.
filterTrainsDescription: Filter trains by destination or departure station

stationPage.notFound { stationName }: No traffic information for {stationName} in the next 24 hours.
stationPage.routeNotFound { from } { to }: No traffic information for route { from } to { to }

meta.description { siteName }: { siteName } shows you Finnish train traffic in real time.

meta.description { trainType } { trainNumber: { trainType } { trainNumber } timetables and services in real-time.

buttons.geolocationLabel: Use the location service to search for the station closest to you.
buttons.searchLabel: Go to the page that matches your search query.

errors.shareError: Sharing failed for unknown reason, try again.
errors.positionError: Location couldn't be fetched. Ensure you have given location permissions.
errors.positionUnavailable: Location couldn't be fetched because location is unavailable.
errors.positionTimeout: The location could not be retrieved. Request timed out.
errors.badGeolocationAccuracy: Geolocation was inaccurate, the list of stations has been updated.
errors.nojs: Enable JavaScript in your browser settings.

digitraffic.tooManyRequests: Too many requests, slow down and try again in a few moments.
digitraffic.networkError: Network connection failed while fetching data from server, try again and check your connection.
digitraffic.unexpected: There was an unexpected error while connecting to Digitraffic.

errors.unknown: We ran into a brick wall, sorry about that. Try refreshing the page, if that does not work please contact:

showingLatest for { date }: Showing latest train, you may show the train for {date} by clicking the button below.
trackStatus: You can track its status here:
locationAccurateTo { metres }; Updated {: Location accurate to { metres }. Last updated { ago }.
emptyFavoritesBody: You can add stations to your favorites in station screen menu.
{ train } from { track } to { station }: { train } from track { track } to { station }
scheduled departure { time } estimated {: Scheduled departure { time } o'clock {estimate, select, undefined {} other {(estimate {estimate})}}
scheduled arrival { time } estimated { e: Scheduled arrival { time } o'clock {estimate, select, undefined {} other {(estimate {estimate})}}

symbols.31: Partly cloudy and periods of light rain
symbols.32: Partly cloudy and periods of moderate rain
symbols.33: Partly cloudy and periods of heavy rain
symbols.34: Mostly cloudy and periods of light rain
symbols.35: Mostly cloudy and periods of moderate rain
symbols.36: Mostly cloudy and periods of heavy rain
